com.montefiore.gaulthiergain.adhoclibrary.datalink.service

Class ServiceConfig

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.montefiore.gaulthiergain.adhoclibrary.datalink.service.ServiceConfig

  • public class ServiceConfig
extends java.lang.Object

    This class defines several different parameters to setup server's logic.

        Constructor (Bluetooth)
        Parameters:
        nbThreads - a short value to determine the number of threads managed by the server.
        secure - a boolean value to determine if the connection is secure.
        btAdapter - a BluetoothAdapter object which represents the local device Bluetooth adapter.
        uuid - an UUID object which identify the physical device.
